name: CHILDREN'S CARE CENTER, INC., Appellant, v. DAUPHIN COUNTY, MH/MR PROGRAM, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare
name_abbreviation: Children's Care Center, Inc. v. Dauphin County

judges: Before NIX, C.J. and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: CHILDREN’S CARE CENTER, INC., Appellant, v. DAUPHIN COUNTY, MH/MR PROGRAM, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert J. Sugarman and Alan M. Kaplan, Sugarman & Associates, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Jason W. Manne, Dept. of Public Welfare, and William A. Fetterhoff, Harrisburg, for Dauphin County.
casebody.head_matter:
648 A.2d 776
CHILDREN’S CARE CENTER, INC., Appellant, v. DAUPHIN COUNTY, MH/MR PROGRAM, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1994.
Decided Oct. 12, 1994.
Reargument Denied Nov. 28, 1994.
Robert J. Sugarman and Alan M. Kaplan, Sugarman & Associates, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Jason W. Manne, Dept. of Public Welfare, and William A. Fetterhoff, Harrisburg, for Dauphin County.
Before NIX, C.J. and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
